summary:
Low End PC
is for people who want better performance.
For small FPS gain Type in console:teofis
descriptionHtml:
How to instal................................
1.open (Document)
2.Open (My Games)
3.Open  (SKYRIM)
4.Open the Zip (is Easy With 7zip)
5.Select (file is here and select cut or copy)
6.U go to skyrim again, paste and replace those 3 files
7.I hugs you.

This file low the distance and it get A small gain of FPS

For a small FPS gain Type in console:teofis

Disables blur, contrast adjustment, fades back in from a black screen, and a few other things. Will give a huge framerate boost on "weak" video cards, at the expense of some prettiness.


Here is the 7zip download page:
[url=http://lp.freedownloads.us.com/1/products/7zip/index2.php?pk=5397&source=yahoo&ext=7ZIP&c=FreeD_7Zip_US]http://lp.freedownloads.us.com/1/products/7zip/index2.php?pk=5397&source=yahoo&ext=7ZIP&c=FreeD_7Zip_US[/url]

My PC:
My System:Windows 7 - 3GB Of Memory RAM (2.60GB usable) Processor Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU B820 @ 1.70Hz 1.70GHz 32-Bit Operating System.
with original setup i run 10-21
with this i run 25-38

author: Mentolight
